dashboard.title: Manager Dashboard
dashboard.manageTrainings: Manage your training tracks and scenarios

feed.noSessionsDescription: Training sessions from your employees will appear here.
feed.browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support video playback.

progress.inviteTeamMembers: Invite team members to get started
progress.viewAnalytics: View Service Practice analytics across all team members
progress.clickToViewDetails: Click on any score to view the full session details
progress.performanceMetrics: Performance metrics across all Service Practice sessions
progress.noServicePracticeData: No Service Practice data available yet
progress.skillComparisonDescription: Skill comparison will appear once employees complete Service Practice sessions

settings.title: Settings
settings.generalDescription: Configure default training language and recording options for your team.
settings.uiLanguageDescription: Choose the language for all UI elements, buttons, and labels throughout the application
settings.uiLanguageReloadWarning: The page will reload after changing the language
settings.defaultTrainingLanguageDescription: This will be the default language for all employee training sessions
settings.recordingOptionsDescription: Configure which recording options will be available to employees for each scenario type.
settings.recordingOptionsNote: At least one recording option must be selected for each scenario type. These settings control what recording options employees will see in the dropdown menu.
settings.sessionNamesVisibilityDescription: Control whether employees can see actual training session names or generic placeholders
settings.showActualNames: Show actual session names to employees
settings.showActualNamesDescription: Employees will see real scenario titles (e.g., "Handling Angry Customer")
settings.showGenericNames: Employees will see generic names (e.g., "Training Session 1", "Training Session 2")
settings.sessionNamesNote: Hiding session names creates a "surprise mode" effect where employees discover what they're training on when they start the session. This can increase engagement and simulate real-world unpredictability.

flipboard.title: Flipboard Training
flipboard.description: User plays customer, AI plays employee with full knowledge
flipboard.employeeRoleDescription: What role the AI employee plays (e.g., 'Front Desk Staff', 'Server', 'Barista')

tracks.trainingTracksDescription: Create and manage training tracks for your team. Each track contains multiple scenarios.
tracks.allScenariosDescription: All scenarios available in your company. You can edit them here or assign them to training tracks.
tracks.createTrackFirst: Create a training track first, then add scenarios to it.
tracks.addScenariosPrompt: Add existing scenarios to this track or create new ones.
tracks.confirmDeleteTrack: Are you sure you want to delete this track? This will also delete all scenarios in this track.
tracks.confirmDeleteScenario: Are you sure you want to delete this scenario?
tracks.confirmRemoveFromTrack: Are you sure you want to remove this scenario from this track? The scenario will still be available in other tracks and in the main scenarios list.
tracks.legacyTrackWarning: This scenario uses the legacy track_id system. To remove it, please edit the scenario and change its track assignment.
tracks.noVoicesConfigured: No voices configured. Go to Settings â†’ Voices to add voices.

recommendations.scenarioDescription: Recommendations scenarios are video response training where TTS asks questions and employees respond through voice and video. Select questions from your recommendation question pool.

track.trackNamePlaceholder: e.g., New Hire Customer Service Training
track.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the training track objectives and what employees will learn

employeeView.noTracksDescription: This employee hasn't been assigned any training tracks yet.
employeeView.noSessionsDescription: This employee hasn't completed any training sessions yet.

scenario.title: Title
scenario.titlePlaceholder: e.g., Handling an angry customer complaint
scenario.changeTrackNote: Change this to move the scenario to a different training track
scenario.situationPlaceholder: Describe the situation the employee will face
scenario.sessionTimeLimitNote: Maximum duration for this role-play session (1-60 minutes)
scenario.firstMessagePlaceholder: e.g., 'Excuse me, I ordered a latte 10 minutes ago and I'm still waiting. This is ridiculous!'
scenario.firstMessageNote: The AI customer's opening line. Leave empty for a generic greeting. The AI will naturally translate this to the session language.
scenario.instructionsPlaceholder: What should the employee learn or practice?
scenario.clientBehaviorPlaceholder: Describe how the client/customer will behave in this scenario
scenario.expectedResponsePlaceholder: Describe the ideal way an employee should respond
scenario.voiceSelectionNote: Select voices for this scenario. System will randomly pick one matching the session language.
scenario.milestonesNote: Add specific objectives that employees can achieve for bonus points during role-play.
scenario.topicsNote: Choose knowledge topics for this theory session. Questions from these topics will be asked during training.
scenario.questionsNote: Choose specific recommendation questions for this session.

questionProgress.title: Progress by Topic
questionProgress.questionsNeedPractice: You have {count} questions that need practice
questionProgress.useStartTraining: Use the "Start Training" button in your training tracks below.
questionProgress.aiTrainerNote: The ElevenLabs AI trainer will ask these specific questions during theory sessions.
questionProgress.managerOverride: Manager Override: Status manually set to "{status}"
questionProgress.noQuestionsDescription: Questions will appear here once they are generated or added manually.

sessionAnalysis.noDataDescription: {employeeName} needs to complete at least 2 Service Practice sessions with analysis to view this report.
sessionAnalysis.noImprovements: No recurring improvement areas identified yet.
sessionAnalysis.clickToGenerate: Click "Generate Analysis" to get AI-powered coaching insights and personalized recommendations.
sessionAnalysis.aiWillAnalyze: The AI will analyze patterns across all {count} sessions to provide actionable feedback.

knowledgeAnalysis.title: Knowledge Analysis
knowledgeAnalysis.analyzeDescription: Analyze {employeeName}'s knowledge mastery across Theory Q&A and Service Practice sessions.
knowledgeAnalysis.question: Q:

knowledgeBase.title: Knowledge Base
knowledgeBase.subtitle: Organize and manage your company documentation
knowledgeBase.noCategoriesDescription: Get started by creating your first category.
knowledgeBase.noDocumentsDescription: Start by adding your first document to this category.
knowledgeBase.confirmDeleteCategory: Are you sure? This will delete all documents in this category.
knowledgeBase.confirmDeleteDocument: Are you sure you want to delete this document?
knowledgeBase.questionsGenerated:
âœ… AI Question Pool Generated & Saved!

ðŸ“Š Results:
â€¢ {topicsExtracted} topics extracted
â€¢ {questionsSaved} questions saved to database
â€¢ {documentsAnalyzed} documents analyzed

Questions are now saved and ready for training sessions!
knowledgeBase.questionsFailed: âŒ Failed to generate questions. Please check console for details.
knowledgeBase.noQuestionsDescription: Click "ðŸ¤– Generate Questions" to create an AI-powered question pool from your documents.
knowledgeBase.questionsWillBeMoved: {count} question{plural} will be moved to the selected topic.
knowledgeBase.addQuestionsDescription: Paste your questions here and AI will search your knowledge base to find the answers automatically.
knowledgeBase.enterQuestionsDescription: Enter your questions (one per line). AI will search your knowledge base documents to find answers.
knowledgeBase.questionPlaceholder:
Enter your questions here, one per line. For example:
What is the price of cappuccino?
How do you make a latte?
What sizes are available for espresso?
knowledgeBase.questionsShouldEndWithMark: Questions should end with "?" and be specific enough to find in your documents.
knowledgeBase.aiSearchingKnowledgeBase: AI is searching through your knowledge base to find answers.
knowledgeBase.processedAndSaved: Processed {processed} questions, saved {saved} to "Added Manually" category
knowledgeBase.audioTagsTip: Tip: Click audio tags above to copy them, then paste into your questions to control TTS emotion and delivery. Questions work best when specific to your knowledge base documents.
knowledgeBase.recommendationPlaceholder:
Enter your questions here, one per line. Use audio tags for emotion control!

Examples:
[excited] Have you tried our seasonal special?
[curious] What flavors do you enjoy? [pause]
[professional] I'd recommend our signature blend.

employees.inviteEmployeesDescription: Invite employees and manage their training access
employees.searchPlaceholder: Search employees by name or email...
employees.inviteLinkDescription: Create an invite link for a new team member
employees.noEmployeesMatchSearch: No employees match your search for "{searchQuery}"
employees.getStartedInviting: Get started by inviting your first team member
employees.confirmRemoveEmployee: Are you sure you want to remove {name}? This will disable their invite link and revoke access.
employees.shareInviteLinkDescription: Share this link with the employee. They can use it to create their account and join your team.
employees.theyWillCreateAccount: They'll create their account using this link
employees.assignTracksOnceJoined: You can assign training tracks once they join
employees.nameWillAppear: This name will appear on their invite and training dashboard
employees.confirmRemoveScenario: Are you sure you want to remove "{scenarioTitle}" from this employee?

employeeDashboard.noTracksDescription: Your manager hasn't assigned any training tracks to you yet. Once assigned, you'll see them here and can start your training sessions.
employeeDashboard.managerWillAssign: Your manager will assign specific training tracks
employeeDashboard.youWillSeeScenarios: You'll see available scenarios and exercises
employeeDashboard.noSessionsDescription: You haven't completed any training sessions yet. Start your first training session to see it here.
employeeDashboard.specificScenariosAssigned: Specific scenarios assigned to you individually
employeeDashboard.browserNoVideoSupport: Your browser does not support video playback.

assignments.addNotesPlaceholder: Add any notes about this assignment...
assignments.noScenariosAvailable: No scenarios available for this track
assignments.pleaseSelectOneScenario: Please select at least one scenario to assign.

training.notFoundDescription: The training assignment you're looking for doesn't exist.

sessionTypes.theoryDescription: Structured knowledge assessment - Answer questions accurately and concisely
sessionTypes.servicePracticeDescription: Interactive customer service training with AI customer
sessionTypes.recommendationsDescription: Learn to suggest appropriate products and services
sessionTypes.flipboardDescription: Experience the customer perspective - ask questions and see how a knowledgeable employee should respond

modes.flipboardDescription: Experience the customer perspective - ask questions and see how a knowledgeable employee should respond

complete.title: Training Complete!
complete.subtitle: You've completed: {trackName}
complete.successMessage: You've successfully completed the training session. Your progress has been recorded.
complete.recommendationNote: Recommendation training focuses on practical skills - no right or wrong answers

configuration.languageDescription: Choose the language for your conversation with the AI trainer. The agent will respond in the selected language.
configuration.goalsHiddenMessage: Your goals and key milestones will be revealed when you start the training session

recording.title: Session Recording
recording.chooseDescription: Choose whether to record your training session. Recordings help with performance review and improvement, but are completely optional.
recording.recommendationsDescription: This recommendation training requires video recording to capture your responses to spoken questions.
recording.theoryDescription: Recording is required for this training session. Choose your preferred recording format.
recording.defaultDescription: Choose your recording preference for this training session.

descriptions.none: Training session will not be recorded. Only text transcript will be saved.
descriptions.audio: Record your voice during the training session for review and improvement.
descriptions.audioVideo: Record both your voice and screen activity for comprehensive training analysis.

privacy.label: Privacy:
privacy.none: Maximum privacy - no audio or video captured
privacy.audio: Audio only - your voice will be captured and stored securely
privacy.audioVideo: Audio + screen capture - full session recording for detailed review
privacy.title: Data Security & Privacy
privacy.description: All recordings are stored securely and are only accessible by you and authorized training managers. You can request deletion of your recordings at any time. Recordings are used solely for training evaluation and improvement purposes.

selectedDescriptions.none: No Recording - Only text transcript will be saved
selectedDescriptions.audio: Audio Recording - Your voice will be captured for review
selectedDescriptions.audioVideo: Audio + Video Recording - Full session recording for detailed analysis

videoAspectRatio.title: Video Aspect Ratio
videoAspectRatio.description: Choose the video format that works best for your device and viewing preferences.

privacy.title: Data Security & Privacy
privacy.description: All recordings are stored securely and are only accessible by you and authorized training managers. You can request deletion of your recordings at any time.

buttons.attemptLimitMessage: You have reached the maximum number of attempts ({maxAttempts}) for this scenario.

recommendationTTS.uploadingVideo: Please wait while we upload your training session video.
recommendationTTS.readyToStart: Ready to start your recommendation training session with {count} questions
recommendationTTS.eachQuestionRead: Each question will be read aloud with {time} to respond via video

theoryPractice.allMasteredDescription: Great job! You've correctly answered all available theory questions. There are no questions that need practice right now.
theoryPractice.sessionCompleteDescription: You've completed your theory practice session. Your progress has been recorded.
theoryPractice.improvementTip: ðŸ’¡ Tip: Practice more to improve your accuracy! Questions you got wrong will appear again in future sessions.
theoryPractice.excellentWork: ðŸŽ‰ Excellent! You're mastering the theory content. Keep up the great work!

theoryPractice.questionProgress: Question {current} of {total} â€¢ {needsPractice} questions need practice
theoryPractice.tryAgainHint: ðŸ’¡ This question was answered incorrectly before - let's try again!

sessionHistory.sessionNotFoundDescription: The requested training session could not be found.
sessionHistory.configurationUsed: Configuration used for this training session
sessionHistory.customerInRoleplay: Customer in Roleplay - Will act according to scenario behavior
sessionHistory.normalDescription: The customer is polite and patient. Maintain professionalism and friendly service.
sessionHistory.coldDescription: The customer is reserved and skeptical. Show authenticity and competence.
sessionHistory.frustratedDescription: The customer is impatient and needs quick resolution. Show efficiency and acknowledge their time pressure.
sessionHistory.angryDescription: The customer is very upset and demanding. Provide genuine empathy and concrete solutions.
sessionHistory.extremelyAngryDescription: The customer is furious and confrontational. Requires exceptional empathy and above-and-beyond service.
sessionHistory.randomVoiceDescription: The system has randomly selected {voiceName} for this session. Reload the page to try a different voice.
sessionHistory.voiceDescription: The AI used the {voiceName} voice for this session
sessionHistory.audioOnly: Audio recording of this training session
sessionHistory.audioVideoRecording: Audio and screen recording of this training session
sessionHistory.fetchingAudio: Fetching conversation audio from ElevenLabs. This may take a moment.
sessionHistory.noRecordingDescription: No recording was made for this session as per your privacy preference.
sessionHistory.noConversation: No conversation was recorded in this session.

theoryAssessment.title: Theory Assessment Results
theoryAssessment.noQuestionsMatched: No questions were matched from this theory session for assessment.
theoryAssessment.excellentMessage: Great job! You demonstrated strong knowledge.
theoryAssessment.goodMessage: Good work! Review the incorrect answers for improvement.
theoryAssessment.needsImprovementMessage: Consider reviewing the material and practicing more questions.
theoryAssessment.question: Question

analysisActions.runAnalysisPrompt: Run analysis on this {mode} session to get detailed assessment results.
analysisActions.fetchPrompt: This session transcript needs to be fetched from ElevenLabs.
analysisActions.noConversationId: No ElevenLabs conversation ID found for this session.

milestoneChecklist.excellentMessage: âœ“ Excellent! You achieved most milestones.
milestoneChecklist.goodMessage: Good progress. Focus on the milestones you missed for improvement.
milestoneChecklist.needsImprovementMessage: Consider reviewing the scenario objectives before practicing again.
